lead_paragraph: Elite level sport rarely produces 'sure things' but the New Zealand men's pair will hope to justify that label when the rowing gets underway at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Rowing-'Sure Things' Could Highlight Rowing in Rio
headline.main: Rowing-'Sure Things' Could Highlight Rowing in Rio

snippet: Elite level sport rarely produces 'sure things' but the New Zealand men's pair will hope to justify that label when the rowing gets underway at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics....
